alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Otsego; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 1:08PM EST until January 09 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Patchy drizzle and freezing drizzle will persist through this afternoon. Icy patches may develop even in places where the air temperature is above freezing, as ground temperatures remain very cold. Additional accumulations will generally be very light. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Wayne, Bradford, Susquehanna, Pike, Lackawanna, Luzerne, and Wyoming counties. In New York, Sullivan, Otsego, Chenango, Cortland, Tioga, Broome, Delaware and Madison counties. * WHEN...Till 4 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions from freezing rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for New York can be found at 511ny.org, and for Pennsylvania at 511pa.com. Or, dial 5 1 1 from within the respective state.
